text: Interesting article on women in motion: <http://motionographer.com/2016/12/05/about-the-gender-gap-in-motion-graphics/?utm_campaign=coschedule&utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=motionographer&utm_content=About+the+gender+gap+in+motion+graphics>

attachments.title: About the gender gap in motion graphics
attachments.text: We are thrilled to bring you this article by Isabel Urbina Peña. Outside of her design practice, Isabel is the creator of Yes, Equal, a project with a simple mission: to close the gender gap in the…
attachments.fallback: Motionographer: About the gender gap in motion graphics

text: That doesnt even account for people of different ethnic or alt. gendered backgrounds.
Note the biggest gender bias is "microaggressions". Also note this is a small pool to take information from, but at least it is a start.
